job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and enhancement of systems utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs), which falls under the core definition of modeling in generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase explicitly mentions 'development', 'troubleshooting', 'maintaining', and 'updating tools', all of which are core activities in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: Building an 'assistant able to guide customers' describes the development of a user-facing application or feature, fitting the software development category.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: Testing and integrating specific AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and CodeWhisperer implies working with and potentially fine-tuning or leveraging these generative models, aligning with modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
job_tasks.justification: Providing 'support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize' technologies is a software development support and integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions
job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and enhancing the 'performance and integration of AI solutions' involves aspects of model tuning, optimization, and ensuring they function effectively, fitting the modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring 'support is available for end-users' and maintaining 'high service quality' are crucial aspects of software development and system maintenance.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity
significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes working with LLMs and state-of-the-art AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer. It requires building and maintaining user-facing applications, optimizing AI solutions, and providing guidance on their use, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
